$description: Additional typography properties required for complete Figma text style export via Tokens Studio. These tokens provide default values for paragraphIndent, paragraphSpacing, textDecoration, and textCase properties.

paragraphIndent.$description: Paragraph first-line indentation. Most UI text uses 'none' (0).

none.$description: No paragraph indentation. Default for UI text.

paragraphSpacing.$description: Space between paragraphs. Most UI text uses 'none' (0).

none.$description: No paragraph spacing. Default for UI text.

capitalize.$description: Capitalize first letter of each word. Use for: titles, headings.

lowercase.$description: All lowercase. Use rarely in UI.

none.$description: No text transformation. Default for most text.

uppercase.$description: All uppercase. Use for: overlines, labels, buttons (sparingly).

textDecoration.$description: Text decoration styles for underlines, strikethroughs, etc.

none.$description: No text decoration. Default for most text.

strikethrough.$description: Strikethrough text. Use for: deleted/removed content, completed tasks.

underline.$description: Underlined text. Use for: links, emphasized content.
